pageProduct.name: The Hemp Company The Conditioner 200ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Conditioner for hair

Common Uses

To condition hair

Directions

Apply to wet hair and distribute through the hair, from the roots to the ends. Gently massage into the hair. Leave for 3 minutes. Rinse. The Conditioner should be used after every wash to condition hair leaving it hydrated, soft and nourished.
